thing-type.label: 10001020-13X Dimmer IO: Phase cut dimmer
thing-type.description: Dimmer IO: Phase cut dimmer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe electronic dimmer switch 230V ~ with 2/3 wire phase cut is a switch from Simon 100 serie. These types of dimmer switches have a power of 50W to 240W for traditional loads and 9W to 100W for LED loads. This is highly recommended for all types of uses (domestic, hotels, hospitals ...). The dimmer switch is only compatible with Simon 100 frames.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPut controller into inclusion mode.</li&gt <li&gtWhen the pushbutton is released after a press of (2sec<T<20sec) the device will send a NIF to include the device to the Z-Wave network. Main LED will blink with 0,3 sec period.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPut controller into exclusion mode.</li&gt <li&gtWhen the pushbutton is released after a press of (2sec<T<20sec) the device will send a NIF to include the device to the Z-Wave network. Main LED will blink with 0,3 sec period.</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtOn/Off Report when load state is changed:</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtOn -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x01 - 0x63 Report the dimming level</li&gt <li&gtOff -> CC Basic, Basic Report, Value 0x00</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtInstant Power Consumption vary over 10% and is stable almost 2sec:</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtCC Meter, Meter Report, “Electric meter”, “Consumed”, “Watts”, Size 4, Precision 1, Value (W)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtCalibration requirement change. (If device needs to be calibrated and is Added into a Z-Wave network, it will report after receive an Association Set of life line).</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtCalibration required -> CC Configuration, Configuration Report, Param 23, Value 0xFF</li&gt <li&gtCalibration not required -> CC Configuration, Configuration Report, Param 23, Value 0x00</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtAfter reset the Z-Wave module, a DEVICE-RESET-LOCALLY-NOTIFICATION is sent.</p&gt
